metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000546 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Triplea version <= 1.9.0.0.10291 contains a XML External Entity (XXE)vulnerability in Importing game data that can result in Possibleinformation disclosure, server-side request forgery, or remote codeexecution. This attack appear to be exploitable via Specially crafted gamedata file (XML).

criterions.comment: triplea: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
